verses.roman:
sahaje nirmala ei 'brāhmaṇa'-hṛdaya
kṛṣṇera vasite ei yogya-sthāna haya

synonyms: sahaje—by nature; nirmala—without contamination; ei—this; brāhmaṇa-hṛdaya—heart of a brāhmaṇa; kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; vasite—to sit down; ei—this; yogya-sthāna—proper place; haya—is.
translation: "The heart of a brāhmaṇa is by nature very clean; therefore it is a proper place for Kṛṣṇa to sit.
